item.title: ICICI Prudential称印度长期债券需求将上升
item.description: 印度最大的保险公司之一表示，养老基金的增长和即将纳入的指数可能会支撑对印度长期债券的需求。【原文：Demand for India’s longer-duration bonds is likely to be supported from growth in pension funds and the upcoming index inclusion, according to one of the country’s largest insurers.】

item.title: 全球基金自 2017 年以来最看好印度股票期货
item.description: 在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）重返第三个任期并承诺保持政策制定的连续性之后，外国人正在增加对印度股票衍生品的看涨头寸。【原文：Foreigners are ratcheting up their bullish positions on Indian equity derivatives after Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s return for a third term promised continuity in policy making.】

item.title: 彭博社法国民意调查：勒庞党扩大领先优势
item.description: 根据彭博社的民意调查，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民联盟在周日举行的法国第一轮临时立法选举前继续扩大领先优势，而埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统领导的复兴党及其盟友则停滞在第三位。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally has continued to widen its lead ahead of the first round of France’s snap legislative election on Sunday while President Emmanuel Macron’s Renaissance party and its allies have stalled in third place, according to Bloomberg’s poll of polls.】

item.title: 中国向澳大利亚、新西兰和波兰提供免签证待遇
item.description: 中国表示将向澳大利亚、新西兰和波兰公民提供免签证计划，这是中国与这些国家建立更紧密关系的最新迹象。【原文：China said it will extend its visa-waiver program to citizens from Australia, New Zealand and Poland in the latest sign of closer ties with the countries.】

item.title: 麦格理不畏熊市大军，日元有望升至 120 点
item.description: 日元多头最近基本上都销声匿迹了，但麦格理集团有限公司（Macquarie Group Ltd.）是一个明显的例外。【原文：Yen bulls have largely been in hiding recently, but one notable outlier is Macquarie Group Ltd.】

item.title: 交易商押注香港开发商新鸿基将迎来喘息机会
item.description: 由于新鸿基地产有限公司的股价在 15 年低点附近徘徊，投资者认为没有必要对冲更多跌幅。【原文：As Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. shares hover around a 15-year low, investors are seeing little need to hedge against more declines.】

item.title: 法国 2017 年大选带来截然不同的市场压力
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞的极右翼政党首次接近赢得法国政权时，激动的投资者出于对她可能造成的潜在经济损失的担忧，推高了债券收益率溢价。【原文：The first time Marine Le Pen’s far-right party got close to winning power in France, agitated investors drove up bond yield premiums out of concern for the potential economic damage she might cause.】

item.title: 集团称，液化天然气风险包括俄罗斯制裁和工厂老化
item.description: 据国际天然气联盟称，全球液化天然气市场面临着供应的不确定性，这些因素包括对俄罗斯燃料的制裁、工厂老化以及红海船只遇袭等。【原文：The global market for liquefied natural gas faces supply uncertainty from factors including sanctions on Russian fuel, aging plants and attacks on vessels in the Red Sea, according to the International Gas Union.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市将反弹
中国揭露政府资金滥用，凸显财政风险
item.description: 中国发现，官员们允许将从特别债券或中央政府预算中筹集的现金投资于不合格或已停工的项目，这使人们对当前财政措施在促进经济复苏方面的有效性产生了疑问。【原文：China discovered that officials allowed cash raised from special bonds or funds from the central government budget to be invested in subpar or halted projects, raising questions about the effectiveness of current fiscal measures in bolstering economic recovery.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 挪威养老基金因与以色列的关联退出卡特彼勒股份
item.description: 挪威最大的私人养老基金退出了卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：Norway’s largest private pension fund has exited its stake in Caterpillar Inc., citing concerns that the US company may be contributing to human rights abuses in the West Bank and Gaza.】

item.title: 国泰称三名学员飞行员被美国培训计划除名
item.description: 国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd.）在美国的一个培训项目中开除了三名不符合事故报告要求的实习飞行员。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. has removed three cadet pilots from one of its training programs in the US following their non-compliance with incident reporting requirements.】

item.title: 澳新银行首席执行官称不再为普通人服务
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的银行之一的首席执行官说，"我们不再为中间阶层提供银行服务了"，因为监管缓冲措施使工薪家庭无法借贷。【原文：The chief executive officer of one of Australia’s largest banks said that “we don’t bank the middle anymore,” due to regulatory buffers that keep working households from borrowing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩认为 2024 年再减息两次的赌注 "合理"。
item.description: 管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，投资者对欧洲央行今年再放松两次货币政策，并在2025年将借贷成本降至2.25%的预期是合理的。【原文：Investor expectations for the European Central Bank to loosen monetary policy twice more this year — and bring borrowing costs to as low as 2.25% in 2025 — are fair, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 法国公司急于在大选前出售垃圾债务
item.description: 在本周末举行的第一轮议会选举后，法国企业正急于在可能出现的混乱之前获得资金。【原文：French companies are rushing to secure funding ahead of any potential disruptions following the first round of parliamentary elections this coming weekend.】

item.title: 会计 "违规 "敲打日本二手书店中坚力量
item.description: 日本一家二手书连锁店运营商表示，在发现包括几家店的员工 "虚构采购 "在内的会计违规行为后，将推迟发布财报，导致其股价自 2022 年 4 月以来暴跌幅度最大。【原文：A Japanese used bookstore chain operator said it will delay its earnings release after finding accounting irregularities including “fictitious purchases” by employees at several stores, sending its stock plunging by the most since April 2022.】

item.title: 肯特表示，澳大利亚央行的高利率促使一些房屋借款人出售房屋
item.description: 储备银行的一位高级官员表示，在利率升高之际，资金紧张的澳大利亚家庭越来越多地选择出售房产来偿还住房贷款。【原文：Australian households with stretched finances are increasingly opting to sell their property to pay off home loans at a time of elevated interest rates, a senior Reserve Bank official said.】

item.title: 中国煤炭供应过剩，提前成功应对夏季短缺
item.description: 进入炎热的夏季，中国煤炭供应过剩，这是中国政府为确保在通常出现消费高峰的季节有足够的主要燃料为工厂降温和供电而采取的行动的一个成功开端。【原文：China has a glut of coal heading into the hotter summer months, a successful start to Beijing’s campaign to ensure there’s enough of its mainstay fuel to keep cool and power factories during the season when consumption typically peaks.】

item.title: 韩国大宗交易在信息披露规则收紧前蓄势待发
item.description: 预计韩国的大宗股票销售将有所增加，因为持有者希望在规则修改要求披露更多信息之前筹集资金。【原文：South Korea is expected to see an increase in block equity sales as holders seek to raise funds before a change in rules requires more disclosures.】

item.title: 中国 10 年期国债收益率跌至 2002 年以来最低点，反弹得以延续
item.description: 中国基准债券的收益率跌至二十多年来的最低点，原因是投资者对国内经济的担忧挥之不去，并预期会有进一步的刺激措施，因此继续涌向中国债券。【原文：The yield on China’s benchmark bond fell to a more than two decade low as investors continued to flock to the notes amid lingering concerns about the domestic economy and expectations for further stimulus.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：银行股重回主导地位
数据中心加热的奥克兰冲浪公园获监管机构批准
item.description: 总部位于美国的冲浪公园开发商 Aventuur 公司获准在新西兰开发一个项目，该项目承诺全年都能享受到由附近数据中心的热量加热的海浪。【原文：US-based surf park developer Aventuur won approval to develop a New Zealand project promising year-round access to waves warmed by heat from a nearby data center.】

item.title: 利润缩水，韩国银行警告开发商债务风险
item.description: 韩国央行表示，韩国开发商的财务问题可能会恶化，因为他们开始承受市场低迷对其盈利造成的冲击，这是对继续给经济蒙上阴影的信贷风险发出的最新警告。【原文：Financial troubles at South Korean developers may worsen as they start to bear the brunt of a market slump that weighs on their earnings, the central bank said, issuing the latest warning over credit risks that continue to overshadow the economy.】

item.title: 汇丰银行上调韩国股票评级至增持，因未来将实现内存增长
item.description: 汇丰控股公司将韩国股票评级从 "中性 "上调至 "增持"，理由是存储器行业的增长机会和政府举措将提升估值。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc lifted Korean stocks to overweight from neutral, citing growth opportunities in the memory sector and government initiatives to boost valuations.】

item.title: 美元走强，中国第六天确定较弱的人民币定盘价
item.description: 中国连续第六个交易日下调人民币日参考汇率，进一步放松了对人民币的控制，因为美元的韧性和经济复苏喜忧参半。【原文：China weakened its daily reference rate for the yuan for a sixth straight session, further relaxing its grip on the currency as dollar resilience and a mixed economic recovery weighs.】

item.title: 交易员称日本周五前干预日元汇率 "疯狂
item.description: 日元的下一个大痛点，也是日本采取干预措施的潜在导火索，可能会出现在周五美联储所青睐的美国通胀指标的读数上。【原文：The next big pain point for the yen — and a potential trigger for intervention from Japan — may emerge from a readout on the Federal Reserve’s favored US inflation gauge on Friday.】

item.title: 国营石油巨头墨西哥石油公司（Pemex）在千亿美元债务的压力下获得税收缓刑
item.description: 墨西哥允许墨西哥石油公司推迟缴纳月度税款，这是在政府努力使这家国有石油公司获得更稳固的财政基础时遇到的一个挫折。【原文：Mexico granted Petroleos Mexicanos a deferral of its monthly tax payment, a setback as the government tries to put the state-owned oil company on firmer financial footing.】

item.title: Man Group 基金预计中国市场将在政策推动下反弹
item.description: 全球最大的上市对冲基金公司 Man Group 的一位资产经理预计，7 月份的中国最高领导人会议将推出旨在刺激消费的措施，以重振中国低迷的股市。【原文：An asset manager at Man Group, the world’s biggest publicly traded hedge fund firm, expects that the July meeting of China’s top leaders will roll out measures aimed at boosting consumption to revive the country’s sluggish stock market.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。英伟达（Nvidia）股价反弹助推美股走高。印度央行对经济增长持乐观态度。大众汽车向电动汽车制造商 Rivian 伸出了援手。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. A rebound in Nvidia shares helped push US stocks higher. India’s central bank is upbeat about growth. And Volkswagen has thrown EV maker Rivian a lifeline. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】
